event_text: r_c watches with exhausted eyes as m_c violently digs a hole off to the side of c_n camp, flinging dirt everywhere. m_c approaches less than a minute later, covered in dirt and with a long worm in their jaws. Mumbled, m_c asks if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can keep {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new friend. Exasperated, r_c tells {PRONOUN/m_c/object} yes and to not dig holes in camp, and then tiredly walks over to clean up m_c's mess.
m_c finds a worm in camp on a rainy day! m_c decides to keep it.
